resources.string:
- This app is designed to take charge of your own happiness. 
 
- Try listing/thinking of your goals before using this app. 
 
 - Please keep track of tangible work such as frequencies of mistakes as you will be more positive using these proven techniques, but your work may not show any change
Try listing/thinking of your goals before using this app.

Please keep track of tangible work such as frequencies of mistakes as you will be more positive using these proven techniques, but your work may not show any change This app is designed to take charge of your own happiness.
Think about your day and all of the things in it that make you feel grateful. Take some time and write them down.
